title: 19 St. Patrick's Day Nails That Will Have You Feeling Lucky
description: If you love getting your nails done, there's another reason to take a trip to your favorite salon - St. Patrick's Day. While any day is the perfect occasion to see your nail tech, the March 17th holiday presents the best opportunity to have a little extra fun with your set. St. Patrick's Day is on the horizon, so you may be on the hunt for classy nails to get in the spirit. If you're worried about getting pinched by a leprechaun this St. Paddy's Day, add the perfect touch of shamrock green to your ensemble with a festive manicure. There are plenty of St. Patrick's Day nails to choose from that are anything but corny - from a chic play on the classic french manicure with a green four-leaf clover to glitter polish to accomplish that pot-of-gold vibe. And if case you're feeling extra adventurous (or inspired by Selena Gomez), opt for a dirty martini set. Minimalists and maximalists alike, we've rounded up St. Patrick's Day nail designs you'll want to keep all month long. Even if you don't have any plans to celebrate, changing your nails is always a good idea. Whether it's a simple green nail polish on your natural nails or something a little more intricate on an almond-shaped set, keep reading for endless inspiration for St. Patrick's Day nails.
author: Katelyn Evans
excerpt: From classy french designs to glittery green nails, get the best St. Patrick's Day nails inspiration here.

html:
If you love getting your nails done, there's another reason to take a trip to your favorite salon — St. Patrick's Day. While any day is the perfect occasion to see your nail tech, the March 17th holiday presents the best opportunity to have a little extra fun with your set. St. Patrick's Day is on the horizon, so you may be on the hunt for classy nails to get in the spirit. If you're worried about getting pinched by a leprechaun this St. Paddy's Day, add the perfect touch of shamrock green to your ensemble with a festive manicure.

There are plenty of St. Patrick's Day nails to choose from that are anything but corny — from a chic play on the classic french manicure with a green four-leaf clover to glitter polish to accomplish that pot-of-gold vibe. And if case you're feeling extra adventurous (or inspired by Selena Gomez), opt for a dirty martini set. Minimalists and maximalists alike, we've rounded up St. Patrick's Day nail designs you'll want to keep all month long. Even if you don't have any plans to celebrate, changing your nails is always a good idea. Whether it's a simple green nail polish on your natural nails or something a little more intricate on an almond-shaped set, keep reading for endless inspiration for St. Patrick's Day nails.

Glitter Gradient St. Patrick's Day Nails

If you're a minimalist but still want to get in the holiday spirit, a green glitter gradient with a neutral base is the way to go.

Green St. Patrick's Day Nails

As popular as acrylic nails are, it's always good to go back to the basics and rock your natural nails. There's nothing more classic than a green set.

Spring Green St. Patrick's Day Nails

If you love bright hues and still want to be in theme, opt for a pastel green along with edgy chrome detail.

Abstract Green St. Patrick's Day Nails

When you can't settle on one design, going with an abstract set will never steer you wrong. This set which features different shades of green with a touch of the aura nail art trend, is perfect to rock on the 17th and beyond.

Lucky Ombre St. Patrick's Day Nails

If you want to go all out, this unconventional take on America's favorite leprechaun is perfect for you.

3D Bubble Green St. Patrick's Day Nails

Looking for less obvious St. Paddy's nails while making a statement? These drippy nails in a gorgeous mint green surely fit the bill.

Rainbow St. Patrick's Day Nails

In case you're on the hunt for a rainbow design that's not too loud, consider this french set that subtly nails the vibe while remaining festive.

Green Crystal St. Patrick's Day Nails

You can never go wrong with the all-over bling nail-art trend — just make it green.

Pastel Lucky Charms St. Patrick's Day Nails

Go the unconventional route, and have lavender or pastel blue as your base color for some of the most fun charm designs.

Green French Glitter St. Patrick's Day Nails

Nothing says festive like adding glitter to your nail set. Make it green, and you're St. Paddy's Day ready!

Forest-Green and Gold St. Patrick's Day Nails

A set with a cool, dark green and shimmery accent is a great option for a luxe yet simple St. Patrick's Day look.

Gold French St. Patrick's Day Nails

Nothing says pot of gold like this festive french manicure.

Green Chrome St. Patrick's Day Nails

Chrome has become a staple nail art trend, but you can take things up a notch with a sleek color like this green-chrome set.

Green Ombré Stiletto St. Patrick's Day Nails

These neon-green ombré nails will have all the jaws dropping on St. Paddy's Day.

Dirty Martini St. Patrick's Day Nails

The dirty martini trend isn't leaving anytime soon, and this set complete with mute green french nails and gel olives is the perfect crossover into St. Patrick's Day.

Green Marble Patrick's Day Nails

These green marble nails are equal parts chic and March 17th-worthy.

Glittery St. Patrick's Day Nails

With this fun mani, you'll be sure to make a statement.

Mix and Match St. Patrick's Day Nails

Nothing says St. Paddy's Day like a nail set with one of the holiday's most loved symbols, a rainbow, and its staple color, green.

Four-Leaf Clover St. Patrick's Day Nails

Take a different approach to the classic four-leaf clover design and have your nail artist paint white clovers over green nails.

Katelyn Evans is a PS contributor.
